messages.message: Yess, have started adding to tests based on the chai/ pupeeter/ mocha framework Kerry set up, and will disseminate more information soon when we have a good harness and an internal understanding of how to most effectively write tests so we can then farm out creation. Goal is to automate away even the UI aspects of UAT (in non-headless mode), test demo flows and reduce time from bug introduction to discovery.
The day UAT is fully automated I promise to dress like the sound of music actress and frolic through the office singing about testing
